*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. H. League to Austin, April 11, 1827. Assistance for the Robertson colony.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bells landing*/location_mentioned* the *date_mentioned n="04-11-1827">11th April 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D sir I left the vessel on which I came in a few days since for the purpose of Calling on you at *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* but haveing a favourable wind I learn that the Vessel will be at this place this *date_mentioned n="04-11-1827">Evening */date_mentioned*which makes it necessary for me to Remain so soon as all my *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*and their Effects are landed I will Immediately Visit *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I inclose you some documents from the *person_mentioned*Texas association */person_mentioned*which you will be so good as to peruse between this and the time I shall see you. the directory of the *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*has made free to solicit your advice and assistance in accomplishing their Views the Tener of which you will be able to discover by an Examination of their documents, if in your Judgement it should be necessary they request through me that you would assist in forming an additional memorial to government in their behalf if a change can be produced favourable to their Views they will introduce the whole *person_mentioned*800 families */person_mentioned*during next season and as many more as they may be authorised to bring and if the protection of their *person_mentioned*property */person_mentioned*can be garanteede the Emigration will be wealthy if the nature of things would permit I would be Extreamly glad to Imploy *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* to go on with me to *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*, if it is possible for him to leave his other Business so long you [will] much oblige me by nameing the thing to him. we are all in fine health. Give my Respects to the *person_mentioned*inhabitants */person_mentioned*of *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* Generally*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
